overview:
Lukas is General Manager and Co-founder of Socialbakers.com, the world’s largest social media statistics portal. His key focus is managing an internal social media agency called Candytech, providing professional services and custom solutions for top its clients, who all share the passion of being on Facebook.

Lukas has a broad experience in social media marketing, from consulting and introducing companies to the world of Facebook, to creating top Facebook campaigns, analyzing results and helping brands to better understand the world of social media in general.
